session_summary: Joanna and Nate caught up at 9:27 am on 7 February, 2022. Joanna shared her mixed emotions about her screenplay submitted to a film festival and hoped it would make it to the big screen. Nate encouraged her, mentioning positive vibes. Joanna asked about Nate's life, and he talked about trying out coconut milk ice cream. They discussed flavors and Nate's dairy-free chocolate cake with berries. Nate recommended "Little Women" to Joanna, who enjoyed it. They agreed to exchange movie recommendations in the future. Both wished each other well and signed off.

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: Hey Nate, long time no see! The screenplay I sent in to the film festival has been on my mind all day everyday. I keep bouncing between crazy emotions like relief, excitement and worry! Fingers crossed a producer or director falls in love with it and it ends up on the big screen - that would be awesome!

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: Hey Joanna! It is a big deal! I'm sure its been a wild ride. Sending some positive vibes and hoping someone likes it enough to get it on the big screen - that would be awesome!

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: Thanks Nate, your support really means a lot. I put a lot of effort into it and I'm crossing my fingers. What about you? Anything new and exciting happening in your life?

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a bowl of ice cream with a spoon in it
conversation_turns.text: Thanks, Joanna. Not much has changed for me, but I just discovered that I can make coconut milk icecream and gave it a try. It was actually pretty good, so I'm proud of myself.

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: Looks delish! Glad you tried something new and it went well. What did you think of it?

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: Super good! It was rich and creamy - might be my new favorite snack!

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: Great! I love when you try something new and it actually works out. Will you give it another go?

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: Yep, it could be fun! I'm looking forward to trying out different flavors and toppings.

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: Yum! Sounds great. Got any favorite flavors for dairy-free desserts?

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: I love coconut milk, but I also enjoy chocolate and mixed berry flavors.

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a piece of cake with berries on a plate
conversation_turns.text: Wow, those sound great! Who can say no to chocolate and berries? I'm tempted to try dairy-free flavors now!

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: Well I also made a dairy-free chocolate cake with berries on it the other day, maybe you would like that!

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: Wow! That sounds yummy! You're so talented. Thanks for sharing your amazing creations! I should really try making one or just pay you a visit and try one for myself!

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: I couldn't agree more! It's always fun experimenting in the kitchen.

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: I can tell! Your cooking skills are awesome. Seen any good movies lately?

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: Not recently. Any good ones you'd recommend?

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: I just watched "Little Women" and it was amazing! It's a great story about sisterhood, love, and reaching for your dreams. Definitely a must-see!

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: Oh, that sounds like a great one! I'll definitely add it to my list. Thanks for the recommendation!

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: Anytime! I'm always down to give movie reccomendations.

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: Good to know! I'll be sure to give you a shout whenever I run out of things to watch!

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: Sounds great! Let me know what you think of it when your done!

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: You bet! You'll be the first to know.

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: Awesome! Enjoy yourself!

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: You too, take care!

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: Later, take care!

Joanna: Joanna sends the first screenplay she wrote on drama and romance to a film festival.
Nate: Nate discovers he can make his own coconut milk ice cream and decides to give it a try.

Joanna: Joanna submitted a screenplay to a film festival and is hoping a producer or director falls in love with it to get it on the big screen.
Joanna appreciates Nate's support for her screenplay and mentions that it means a lot to her.
Joanna seems curious about trying dairy-free desserts and flavors after Nate mentions making coconut milk ice cream.
Joanna enjoys the movie 'Little Women' and recommends it as a great story about sisterhood, love, and reaching for dreams.
Joanna is open to giving movie recommendations and discussing movies.
Nate: Nate supports Joanna's screenplay submission to the film festival and sends positive vibes wishing for its success.
Nate tried making coconut milk ice cream, found it delicious, and is looking forward to trying different flavors and toppings.
Nate mentions enjoying chocolate and mixed berry flavors for dairy-free desserts.
Nate made a dairy-free chocolate cake with berries, showcasing his talent in the kitchen.
Nate is open to trying out new flavors and experimenting in the kitchen.
Nate appreciates Joanna's movie recommendation and expresses interest in watching 'Little Women'.
